005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IIntegerItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
017
018import java.util.ArrayList;
019import java.util.List;
020
021import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
022
023/**
024 * Implements <a href=
025 * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-remove">fn:remove</a>.
026 */
027public final class FnRemove {
028  private static final String NAME = "remove";
029  @NonNull
030  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
031      .name(NAME)
032      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
033      .deterministic()
034      .contextIndependent()
035      .focusIndependent()
036      .argument(IArgument.builder()
037          .name("target")
038          .type(IItem.class)
039          .zeroOrMore()
040          .build())
041      .argument(IArgument.builder()
042          .name("position")
043          .type(IIntegerItem.class)
044          .one()
045          .build())
046      .returnType(IItem.class)
047      .returnZeroOrMore()
048      .functionHandler(FnRemove::execute)
049      .build();
050
051  private FnRemove() {
052    // disable construction
053  }
054
055  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
056  @NonNull
057  private static ISequence<?> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
058      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
059      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
060      IItem focus) {
061    ISequence<?> target = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
062    IIntegerItem position = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true)));
063    return ISequence.ofCollection(fnRemove(target, position));
064  }
065
066  /**
067   * Remove the specified item at {@code position} from the {@code sequence}.
068   *
069   * @param <T>
070   *          the type for the given Metapath sequence
071   * @param target
072   *          the sequence of Metapath items from which we will remove the item
073   * @param positionItem
074   *          the position of the item in the sequence to be removed
075   * @return {@code sequence} the new sequence with the item removed
076   */
077  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.OnlyOneReturn")
078  @NonNull
079  public static <T extends IItem> List<T> fnRemove(
080      @NonNull List<T> target,
081      @NonNull IIntegerItem positionItem) {
082    int position = positionItem.asInteger().intValue();
083
084    if ((position == 0) || (position > target.size())) {
085      return target;
086    }
087
088    List<T> newSequence = new ArrayList<>(target);
089    newSequence.remove(position - 1);
090    return newSequence;
091  }
092}
